# Field data

```{r}
site_info = read.csv("../data/field/site_info_2018-2019.csv")
```




```{r}
site_CN_2001 = site_info %>% group_by(site) %>% filter(site == "CN")

site_CN_2001
```

```{r}

site_ANS_2003
```
